name: Aurora
description:
'''Aurora''', also known as '''Aurora UK''', are a British [[electronic dance music]] group, keyboardist Simon Greenaway (born 4 July 1969). Five of his singles charted on the [[UK Singles Chart]]; his biggest hit is his cover of [[Duran Duran]]'s "[[Ordinary World (song)#Aurora version|Ordinary World]]" at No. 200

His first and only self-titled album was released in 2002 by [[EMI Records]].
